subject: Fw: Thank you for your recent refinance debt request, we are accepting your refinance appication
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pin money to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your entire payment by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this deal will expire TODAY):
$336,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest payments!
Hurry, when the deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this quick form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://skelaenyard.com/
